A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie! Especially on the second view. It's bold\, takes chances\, and tried to deliver new tones and views of the force and its users\, and should be taken as a work of art by an artist\, not tying to fit into a \"Star Wars\" style as to rehash old movies again and again. The humor is fun\, and mostly lands head on\, and I liked the light hearted fun without going overboard on the \"seriousness\" but still delivering a ton of things to think about.
